page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content:
Our Area.
Our area is situated in the region of West Norfolk adjacent to fenland.The main settlements are Methwold, Brookville and Northwold.Methwold and Northwold have a number of shops schools and churches while Brookville, which owes much of its present size to the establishment of a late Victorian fruit growing colony,has one shop and post office.The villages are typical Norfolk 'working villages'.The major employer in the area is the sugar beet factory at Wissington.Methwold has a Monday market and many people visit the area in summer to attend the Summer fete and to visit our church.The parents of Methwold's school children are particularly generous raising over Â£2,000 this year.
